lines.text:
[the President sniffs a piece of shrimp]
Does this smell funny?
Nonesense, what could possibly be wrong with unrefridgerated shrimp?

[Takes another sniff, then bites]
I suppose you're right, just another classic example of my American nivete.
Oh my god, I've got diarrhea!

[the Super Adventure Team is dressed and playing for the terrorists as KISS]
Well, let's keep this party moving with a little change of pace.
I'm sorry, uh... we don't know that.

[on kitties and puppies]
Gentlemen, it is my scientific opinion that we are looking at four tons of cuddle!

[on the attacking kittens and puppies]
How adorably terrifying!
